title: [K-12] Iterative Design Process for Improving Online Education Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform usage, digital content creation experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing capabilities to design microlearning content considering accessibility in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more accessibility principles from the WCAG 2.1 standard
Learners can evaluate content using accessibility checklists optimized for mobile environments
Learners can improve existing microlearning content according to an iterative design process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
